questions.description:
If members are not related, select the â€˜unrelatedâ€™ option.
If you are the parents of adopted children, select the â€˜Mother or fatherâ€™ option to show your relationship to them.
If you have foster children living with you, select the â€˜Unrelatedâ€™ option.
Include half-brothers and half-sisters in the â€˜Step-brother or step-sisterâ€™ category.
Same-sex civil partner is used to describe the relationship between two people who have legally registered a civil partnership.
If none of the options fully reflects your relationship, please select the one which you feel best describes your situation.
